item.description: I took a Data Visualization class in Business school - our first assignment was to track our sleep schedule for 7 days and visualize it on a 6 x 4 notecard.

item.title: MC Escher
item.description: The inspiration for this piece came from a post I saw on instagram. I went through many iterations until settling on the look of the final product. ![MC_design process](/portfolio/Escher_files/Photo Jul 01, 7 19 52 PM.jpg) Original Post I wanted to make something similar using paper. Initially I used a ruler and exacto knife to try and cut these very thin strips. I ultimately switched over to using a Cricut to do the cutting because it can cut much faster and much more precise that I can by hand.

item.title: Solar Powered Canteen

item.title: Hobbies
item.description: In addition to making graphics, I like to make other things as well. Here are a few things that I've made. Wall Art This is an origami piece made from cardstock. The piece on the left was designed using Cricut Design studio, and the piece on the right is a version made from cardstock. Wedding Backdrop In September 2019, my mom and I made this backdrop for a family wedding. The flowers were cut using a Cricut and are made out of cardstock and old jewelry.

item.title: Anthem
item.description: Anthem Inc. is one of the largest health benefits companies in the US, providing various forms of coverage to 41 million insured members in 23 states and DC. In 2020, Anthem Inc. Ranked 29 on the Fortune 500 and 68 on the Global 500. map of anthem coverage Anthem is a massive company by any measure, but they weren't always this size. Anthem grew to its current size by acquiring and merging with a long list of health plans across the country.
